item.description:
The Connecticut Vegetarian and Healthy Living Festival is a 2 day event taking place at the Connecticut Convention Center from April 28-29, 2012. It was created to bring together people who strive to live a healthy lifestyle with exhibitors and professionals who can help them achieve their goals. Our goal is to promote a vegan/vegetarian lifestyle, but it’s not just about our diets. It’s about the animals, our planet, our very existence. After all, we all want the same thing out of life: Health, Happiness and Prosperity.

www.CTVegFest.org

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: 1st Annual Connecticut Vegetarian and Healthy Living Festival
